# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_ALLOW_NO_PASSENGERS_LOCKON

## Summary
Allow a MISSION vehicle to be targeted despite having no passengers. Note: vehicle must still otherwise be targetable

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** allowLockon

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Makes the vehicle accept no passengers.
